description:
Take in the layers of the mighty llama, while enjoying the comfort of this sustainably made tee.Made from a soft blend of organic cotton and recycled polyester.Cotopaxi designates 1% of their revenue to provide grants for non-profits.Cotopaxi products are guaranteed to last 61 years—the average lifespan of a person living in the developing world.

        Sustainability














                      Recycled content








Organic








                      Organically grown content






FairTrade











                      Certified Fair Trade
name: Cotopaxi Topo Llama Graphic T-Shirt - Women's
